svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2020-05-27T14:26:58.986Z" agent="5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/80.0.3987.163 Safari/537.36" etag="b6E6UOdTlCVNYoRkDnTI" version="13.1.4" type="github"><diagram id="HaMD8mrT_SZImtREfQ7g" name="第 1 页"></diagram></mxfile>

g.text: 创建一颗“愿望果”，它的名字叫
【比微信群聊更好的讨论形式】
编辑模式下，按 Ctrl + Shift + End
进入后，按 Ctrl + Shift + Home

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 474px; margin-left: 40px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Verdana; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
@pimgeek
想为注意力与知识管理群
发现比微信群聊
更好的讨论形式

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 570px; margin-left: 40px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 开始进行活跃用户的需求调研

switch.text: 开始进行活跃用户的需求调研

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

用 diagrams.net
作为脚手架工具试试看

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 70px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
